LanguageData.organChanceDescription: Maximum chance to harvest each individual organ when using specified recipe. Actual value is equal to pawns surgery success chance.
LanguageData.bionicChanceDescription: Maximum chance to harvest each individual bionic component when using specified recipe. Actual value is equal to pawns surgery success chance.
LanguageData.corpseAgeDescription: Number of hours during which natural organs can be harvested
LanguageData.numberPartsDescription: Maximum number of organs and bionics that can be harvested from a single corpse
LanguageData.skillScalingDescription: Dictates how much does pawn medical surgery success chance scales when performing autopsy
LanguageData.frozenDecayDescription: Sets how fast natural organs decay while body is frozen compared to warm
